pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interactive Analytical Tools for Zooarchaeological Data // The analysis and inference of faunal remains recovered from archaeological sites concerns the field of zooarchaeology. The zooaRchGUI package provides a graphical user interface to analytical tools found in the R statistical environment to make inferences on zooarchaeological data. Functions in this package allow users to interactively read, manipulate, visualize, and analyze zooarchaeological data.
